name: when i first saw you
description:
trigger warnings: loss of a grandparent, hospitals, bullying, implied depression/cutting, stabbing

i think there was more
to our story than
i can remember
than i want
to remember school was hell for
both of us

another digital chapbook of poetry, this time talking about my experiences during my school days. chronologically and thematically a prequel to 'with every passing day, my love grows'. this one focuses on my childhood, and involves platonic relationships.
